focus: Implement comprehensive test suite for ServiceTitan workflow logic

fields.who: ServiceTitan workflows (Auth Token Manager, Call Association, Job Reminder, Review Request)
fields.what: Clean artifacts, expand test coverage, update documentation, enforce governance
fields.when: Ongoing maintenance until [DEV] tags removed after 98%+ evaluation
fields.why: Project had stale artifacts, tests in wrong locations, outdated documentation
fields.how: 1. Moved Windows artifacts to old/ 2. Reorganized tests to proper structure 3. Updated project.md status 4. Created 42 new tests for core logic
fields.lest: Stale files accumulate, tests fail to run in CI, documentation becomes misleading
fields.with: Vitest test framework, n8n cloud workflows, ServiceTitan API
fields.measuredBy: 60 tests passing, clean project structure, accurate documentation
